comment: /**  * Whether the target context-path matches a regular url.  *  * @param path  the context-path from the incoming HTTP request  * @return <tt>true</tt> to match, <tt>false</tt> if not.  */
code: /**  * Whether the target context-path matches a regular url.  *  * @param path  the context-path from the incoming HTTP request  * @return <tt>true</tt> to match, <tt>false</tt> if not.  */ boolean matches(String path).

comment: /**  * Whether the target context-path matches a REST url.  *  * @param path  the context-path from the incoming HTTP request  * @param wildcard whether to match strict or by wildcards  * @return <tt>true</tt> to match, <tt>false</tt> if not.  */
code: /**  * Whether the target context-path matches a REST url.  *  * @param path  the context-path from the incoming HTTP request  * @param wildcard whether to match strict or by wildcards  * @return <tt>true</tt> to match, <tt>false</tt> if not.  */ boolean matchesRest(String path, boolean wildcard).

comment: /**  * Matches the given request HTTP method with the configured HTTP method of the consumer  *  * @param method    the request HTTP method  * @param restrict  the consumer configured HTTP restrict method  * @return <tt>true</tt> if matched, <tt>false</tt> otherwise  */
code: /**  * Matches the given request HTTP method with the configured HTTP method of the consumer  *  * @param method    the request HTTP method  * @param restrict  the consumer configured HTTP restrict method  * @return <tt>true</tt> if matched, <tt>false</tt> otherwise  */ boolean matchMethod(String method, String restrict).
